Lyric:
[00:02.680]It's the heart on your sleeve never making me wonder
[00:04.490]It's the bond that we tie up and over and under
[00:07.310]You're the sun and the rain and my grass is always green
[00:09.810]With a kiss on my cheek' always letting me know I'm the birds and the bees
[00:15.910]I'm the apple in your eye
[00:17.600]I know that you know that I know you're all I need
[00:20.340]And just when I thought it couldn't get any better
[00:27.020]There you go and do it all again
[00:30.890]Hope this feeling never ends
[00:36.010]'Cause you o o o o...
[00:39.820]You make me happy
[00:48.300]You o o o o...
[00:50.240]You make me happy
[00:58.720]It's the sound of your voice at the end of the phone line
[01:04.410]A tickle in my toes just to know that you're all mine
[01:06.600]Like an ice cream sundae with a cherry on the top
[01:09.090]It's the look in your eyes when I'm wearing your t-shirt
[01:14.210]Your cute little smile after a long day of hard work
